Docs.summary: The interface through which the Ribbon user interface (UI) communicates with a COM add-in to customize the UI.

remarks.para: The IRibbonExtensibility interface has a single method, GetCustomUI.

example.para: In the following example, written in C#, the IRibbonExtensibility interface is specified in the class definition. The procedure then implements the interfaces's only method, GetCustomUI. This method creates an instance of a SteamReader object that reads in the customized markup stored in an external XML file.

Docs.summary: Loads the XML markup, either from an XML customization file or from XML markup embedded in the procedure, that customizes the Ribbon user interface.

example.para: In the following example, written in C#, the IRibbonExtensibility interface is specified in the class definition. The example then implements the interfaces's only method, GetCustomUI.
